===Etymology 1===
<div style="float:right;">
[[File:Fire.JPG|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|火}} (''hi'', ''ho'', ''fu'', ''ka''): '''[[fire]]'''.]]
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ひ}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=ひ}}. /hi<sub>2</sub>/: {{IPAchar|[pɨ]}} > {{IPAchar|[ɸɨ]}} > {{IPAchar|[ɸi]}} > {{IPAchar|[çi]}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

Possibly a later development from older form ''ho'' (see below).

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|ひ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ひ}}

# a [[fire]]; [[flame|flames]]
# a light
# [[heat]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|火遊び|ひ あそび}}: playing with fire
* {{ja-r|火先|ひさき}}: tip of a flame
* {{ja-r|篝火|かがりび}}: a [[fire]] set in an [[iron]] [[cage]]-like [[bucket]] and used as [[illumination]] by [[guard]]s or [[hunter]]s; a [[capable]] person who gets things done
{{der-bottom}}

=====Idioms=====
{{der-top|Idioms}}
* {{ja-r|火を見るよりも明らか|ひ を みる より も あきらか}}: "clearer than seeing the fire" → as [[plain as day]], as [[plain as the nose on one's face]], as [[clear as a bell]]
* {{ja-r|火蓋を切る|ひぶた を きる}}: "to open the lid on a [[cannon]]'s [[touchhole]]" → to [[prepare]] to [[fire]] a [[cannon]]; to [[fire]] a [[cannon]]; to [[start]] doing something
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ほ}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=ほ}}. /ho/: {{IPAchar|[po]}} > {{IPAchar|[ɸo]}} > {{IPAchar|[ho]}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

Only used in compounds, whereas ''hi'' (see above) appears even in ancient texts as a standalone term. Probably the oldest form. Possibly cognate with {{cog|ko|불||fire}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|ほ}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ほ}}

# a [[fire]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|火気|ほけ}}: a [[flame]]; [[heat]]; [[smoke]]
* {{ja-r|炎|ほむら}}, {{ja-r|焔|ほむら}}: [[flames]]; [[metaphorical]] flames, [[connote|connoting]] strong emotions such as [[anger]] or [[jealousy]], or such as [[ambition]] or [[passion]]
* {{ja-r|炎|ほのお}}: a [[flame]]
* {{ja-r|火照る|ほてる}}: to [[feel]] [[hot]] or [[flushed]]
* {{ja-r|火先|ほさき}}: tip of a flame
{{der-bottom}}
